K12D0479_H0447:177a-11: btul lo zhes sgra chen po phyung ngo //
K12D0479_H0447:177a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la thugs rje chen po bskyed de /
K12D0479_H0447:177a-13: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byams pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12D0479_H0447:177a-14: aom buddha mee tri badzra raksha ham/
K12D0479_H0447:177a-15: de nas de skad ces gsungs ma thag tu lha
K12D0479_H0447:177a-16: chen po la babs pa'i sdug bsngal de kun zhi
K12D0479_H0447:177a-17: bar gyur to // de nas yang phyag na rdo
K12D0479_H0447:177a-18: rje'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis reg pas bde ba bla
K12D0479_H0447:177a-19: na med pa 'grub pa'i dbang dang /
K12D0479_H0447:177a-24: mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa nas /
K12D0479_H0447:177a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub pa'i bar du gyur to //
K12D0479_H0447:177a-26: de nas lha chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na
K12D0479_H0447:177a-27: rdo rje'i zhabs mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs
K12D0479_H0447:177a-28: pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12D0479_H0447:177b-0: rnam par thar @177b pa'i bde ba myong ste /
K12D0479_H0447:177b-1: lha chen po'i lus phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phul nas /
K12D0479_H0447:177b-2: 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung sum
K12D0479_H0447:177b-3: cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
K12D0479_H0447:177b-4: gyi khams gyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten
K12D0479_H0447:177b-5: gyi khams 'das pa na thal bas khebs pa zhes
K12D0479_H0447:177b-6: bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thal ba'i dbang
K12D0479_H0447:177b-7: po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par skyes
K12D0479_H0447:177b-8: so // de nas lha chen po'i lus de las ched du brjod pa 'di phyung ngo //
K12D0479_H0447:177b-9: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12D0479_H0447:177b-10: sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med //
K12D0479_H0447:177b-11: yi ge'i tshogs kyis mnan nas su //
K12D0479_H0447:177b-12: mya ngan las ni 'das par gzhag /
K12D0479_H0447:177b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0479_H0447:177b-14: phyag na rdo rjes de las gzhan pa mthu chen
K12D0479_H0447:177b-15: po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po
K12D0479_H0447:177b-16: thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0479_H0447:177b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs shig /
K12D0479_H0447:177b-19: zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig srungs shig /
K12D0479_H0447:177b-20: de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0479_H0447:177b-21: bdag cag ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o //
K12D0479_H0447:177b-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na
K12D0479_H0447:177b-23: rdo rjes srid pa gsum 'dus pa de rnams bos
K12D0479_H0447:178a-4: sdom pa gzung la nga'i dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig /
K12D0479_H0447:178a-5: de dag gis gsol pa; de bzhin du 'tshal na /
K12D0479_H0447:178a-6: bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang dam tshig glo bar ma chud do //
K12D0479_H0447:178a-7: de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam tshig 'di byin no //
K12D0479_H0447:178a-8: byang chub sems ni rims bzhin du //
K12D0479_H0447:178a-9: bskyed nas de yi 'og tu ni //
K12D0479_H0447:178a-10: byang chub chen por ci nus par //
K12D0479_H0447:178a-11: shin tu mnyam gzhag 'bad par bya //
K12D0479_H0447:178a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0479_H0447:178a-13: phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams
K12D0479_H0447:178a-14: 'jug ba'i dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya bcing ba
K12D0479_H0447:178a-15: la sogs pa byas nas dam tshig chen po'i phyag
K12D0479_H0447:178a-16: rgya'i snying po 'dis 'ching du gzhug go /
K12D0479_H0447:178a-17: aom badzra sa ma ya grihna stvam bndha sa ma ya /
K12D0479_H0447:178a-20: sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya stvam/
K12D0479_H0447:178a-23: a'a h'a ryo me bha ba /
K12D0479_H0447:178a-24: aa pra ti h'a ryo me bha ba /
K12D0479_H0447:178a-25: sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shri ya:ku ru h'um/
K12D0479_H0447:178a-26: ha ha ha ha ho: de nas 'di smras ma
K12D0479_H0447:178a-27: thag tu khams gsum gyi srid pa gsum gyi skye
K12D0479_H0447:178a-28: bo 'das pa thams cad rdo rje khro bo ti
K12D0479_H0447:178a-29: rin ti ri'i phyag rgyal ga tu babs nas dam
K12D0479_H0447:178a-31: de nas phyag na rdo rjes tshul bzhin du btsud
K12D0479_H0447:178a-32: nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad go rims bzhin
K12D0479_H0447:178b-0: du @178b bstan te rdo rje rin po che'i dbang

K12D0479_H0447:178b-2: tu byin te / rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur
K12D0479_H0447:178b-3: bas dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
K12D0479_H0447:178b-4: kyi sems can gyi don la bkod do //

K12D0479_H0447:178b-7: dbang phyug chen po ni khro bo'i rdo rje'o //
K12D0479_H0447:178b-8: mthu bo che ni sgyu ma'i rdo rje'o //

K12D0479_H0447:178b-13: su zhes bya bar dbang bskur to; ;de nas bar

K12D0479_H0447:178b-19: de la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to //

K12D0479_H0447:178b-22: sbrang rtsir byed pa ni rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
K12D0479_H0447:178b-23: rgyal ba ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo //
K12D0479_H0447:178b-24: rgyal bar byed po ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ste /

K12D0479_H0447:178b-26: de nas sa bla'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa /
K12D0479_H0447:178b-28: mdzod skyong ni rdo rje tho ba'o //
K12D0479_H0447:179a-2: rlung ni rdo rje'i rlung ngo //

K12D0479_H0447:179a-4: de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya zhes bya bar dbang bskur to //
K12D0479_H0447:179a-5: de nas sa 'og gi dbang po lha thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste /
K12D0479_H0447:179a-6: phag ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
K12D0479_H0447:179a-7: gshin rje ni rdo rje dus so //
K12D0479_H0447:179a-8: gtsug phud sa ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso ba 'o //
K12D0479_H0447:179a-9: ba ru na ni klu'i rdo rje ste; ;de la
K12D0479_H0447:179a-10: sogs pa ni rdo rje bran zhes bya bar dbang
K12D0479_H0447:179a-11: bskur to // de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag
K12D0479_H0447:179a-12: po'i lha mo thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i
K12D0479_H0447:179a-13: dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /

K12D0479_H0447:179a-15: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur cing

K12D0479_H0447:179b-0: de la sogs pa ni khro @179b mo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to //

K12D0479_H0447:179b-3: gsod ma ni rdo rje 'ju ma'o //
K12D0479_H0447:179b-4: za ba ma ni rdo rje za ba ma'o //
K12D0479_H0447:179b-5: bgo ba ni rdo rje bgo ba ma'o //
K12D0479_H0447:179b-6: dga' ba ni rdo rje dga' ba ma'o //

K12D0479_H0447:179b-10: zhi ba ma ni rdo rje pho nya ma'o //
K12D0479_H0447:179b-11: rlung ni mgyogs ma'i rdo rje ma'o //

K12D0479_H0447:179b-15: de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni /

K12D0479_H0447:179b-21: de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran mor dbang bskur to //
K12D0479_H0447:179b-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na
K12D0479_H0447:179b-23: rdo rjes zhugs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas
K12D0479_H0447:179b-24: kyi ye shes rnams bskyed nas phyag rgya bcing ba
K12D0479_H0447:179b-26: rdo rje'i dam tshig mna'i snying po 'di byin no //
K12D0479_H0447:179b-27: rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
K12D0479_H0447:179b-28: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
K12D0479_H0447:179b-30: rigs rnams myur du thal bar byed //
K12D0479_H0447:179b-31: aom ha na sa ma ya h'um phat/
K12D0479_H0447:179b-32: de nas snying po gzung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di byin to //
K12D0479_H0447:180a-2: mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings nas ni //
K12D0479_H0447:180a-3: gcu zhing phyir yang gcu bar bya //
K12D0479_H0447:180a-4: dgos pa'i don sems gang yin pa //

K12D0479_H0447:180a-6: dgos par grub phyir 'dug par byos //
K12D0479_H0447:180a-7: khyod kyi srog ni ma rungs par //
K12D0479_H0447:180a-8: dam tshig 'dis ni gyur ta re //
K12D0479_H0447:180a-9: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
K12D0479_H0447:180a-10: mdzub mo bkug nas rab tu mnan //

K12D0479_H0447:180a-12: gung mo gnyis ka rab tu mnan //
K12D0479_H0447:180a-13: rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yi //

K12D0479_H0447:180a-15: dam tshig 'dis ni khyod gsod do //
K12D0479_H0447:180a-16: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyi ga yi //

K12D0479_H0447:180a-18: mdzub mo sor mo'i rgyab nas mdud //

K12D0479_H0447:180b-1: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la //

K12D0479_H0447:180b-8: rdo rje bcing ba sprel pa ni //
K12D0479_H0447:180b-9: mdzub mo gnyis ka dam por sbyar //
K12D0479_H0447:180b-10: mthe bo gung mo'i rtse mo gnyis //
K12D0479_H0447:180b-11: rdo rje'i phyag rgyar bcings nas kyang //
K12D0479_H0447:180b-12: bzlog ste dpral bar gzhag par bya //
K12D0479_H0447:180b-13: gal te gsod par 'dod na ni //
K12D0479_H0447:180b-14: dgug par bya ba gang yin pa //
K12D0479_H0447:180b-15: de yi mdun du rtag tu 'dug /
K12D0479_H0447:180b-16: de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi snying
K12D0479_H0447:180b-17: po 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dam tshig
K12D0479_H0447:180b-19: aom ba li tod ba li ta badzra a'a garsha ya h'um dza dza /
